* TB meeting, 2009-06-30
** Scott Kitterman's <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ClamavUpdates proposal for a ClamAV update policy]]</nowiki> was endorsed by the Technical Board, contingent on the approval of the security and release teams
